ygData.subject: Re: Time for another Sylly Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite: Day of the week to play:  if i am awake and not at work it is a good time to play. Time of day:
ygData.messageBody:
When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite:

Day of the week to play: if i am awake and not at work it is a good time
to play.

Time of day: midnight to 5am, Australian Time

Longest stretch of continuous play: 20

Way to have game sounds: Full and loud

Distance to sit from display: 2 ft

TV show to have on: TV is for the weak

Music to listen to: non descript public radio station

Beverage (non-alcoholic): Iced Coffee

Beverage (alcoholic): Coopers Sparkling Ale (local South Australian Brew)

Health Food: ahh a trick question, nice one ;)

Junk Food: any
